metadata.title: CVE-2024-56785 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:MIPS: Loongson64: DTS: Really fix PCIe port nodes for ls7aFix the dtc warnings:    arch/mips/boot/dts/loongson/ls7a-pch.dtsi:68.16-416.5: Warning(interrupt_provider): /bus@10000000/pci@1a000000: '#interrupt-cells' found,but node is not an interrupt provider    arch/mips/boot/dts/loongson/ls7a-pch.dtsi:68.16-416.5: Warning(interrupt_provider): /bus@10000000/pci@1a000000: '#interrupt-cells' found,but node is not an interrupt provider    arch/mips/boot/dts/loongson/loongson64g_4core_ls7a.dtb: Warning(interrupt_map): Failed prerequisite 'interrupt_provider'And a runtime warning introduced in commit 045b14ca5c36 ("of: WARN ondeprecated #address-cells/#size-cells handling"):    WARNING: CPU: 0 PID: 1 at drivers/of/base.c:106of_bus_n_addr_cells+0x9c/0xe0    Missing '#address-cells' in /bus@10000000/pci@1a000000/pci_bridge@9,0The fix is similar to commit d89a415ff8d5 ("MIPS: Loongson64: DTS: Fix PCIeport nodes for ls7a"), which has fixed the issue for ls2k (despite itssubject mentions ls7a).

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-hwe package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-kvm package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-hwe package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-oracle package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
